intro.p: The GStreamer team is pleased to announce the first release of the unstable 1.9 release series. The 1.9 release series is adding new features on top of the 1.0, 1.2, 1.4, 1.6 and 1.8 series and is part of the API and ABI-stable 1.x release series of the GStreamer multimedia framework. The unstable 1.9 release series will lead to the stable 1.10 release series in the next weeks. Any newly added API can still change until that point.
Binaries for Android, iOS, Mac OS X and Windows will be provided in the next days.

No perfectly groomed moustache or any amount of fine clothing is going to cover up the truth - these plugins are Bad with a capital B. They look fine on the outside, and might even appear to get the job done, but at the end of the day they're a black sheep. Without a golden-haired angel to watch over them, they'll probably land in an unmarked grave at the final showdown.

Don't bug us about their quality - exercise your Free Software rights, patch up the offender and send us the patch on the fastest steed you can steal from the Confederates. Because you see, in this world, there's two kinds of people, my friend: those with loaded guns and those who dig. You dig.

This module contains a set of plugins that aren't up to par compared to the rest. They might be close to being good quality, but they're missing something - be it a good code review, some documentation, a set of tests, a real live maintainer, or some actual wide use. If the blanks are filled in they might be upgraded to become part of either gst-plugins-good or gst-plugins-ugly, depending on the other factors. If the plugins break, you can't complain - instead, you can fix the problem and send us a patch, or bribe someone into fixing them for you. New contributors can start here for things to work on.

Other modules containing plugins are:
gst-plugins-base contains a basic set of well-supported plugins gst-plugins-good contains a set of well-supported plugins under our preferred license gst-plugins-ugly contains a set of well-supported plugins, but might pose problems for distributors gst-libav contains a set of codecs plugins based on libav (formerly gst-ffmpeg)

bug.summary: gl: More GLES/GL 3 compatibility fixes
ahcsrc: improve error message when camera open fails
mpegpsdemux: sends segment and gap events with invalid time after seek
lv2: port to GStreamer 1.0 and SLV2 to Lilv
gldownload: Support for multi-planar format for GLES
chromaprint: notify fingerprint also via property notify
codecparsers: mpegvideo: Add more fields to the headers.
rfbsrc: incorrectly calculates caps
gldisplay: EAGL " Could not create display "
DTLS: Use unique names for internal elements to ease debugging
gltestsrc: implement missing patterns, port to GL3 / ES3, load shaders with GIO
dashdemux: incorrect segment duration for a segment list
osxaudio: Add device provider support
videoaggregator: No protection from receiving interlaced and non-interlaced content
gstglbasemixer: negotiated logic is partly broken
pnm: Implementation of GRAY16 handling
dashdemux: leading whitespaces in content protection element are not ignored
gltestsrc outputs only black frames for pattern 0 and 11
gl: implement GstGLMemoryEGL
qml: add Windows support
dashdemux: tests: use g_object_unref for test data
dashdemux: tests: add new dashdemux tests
adaptivedemux: use GstSystemClock to all real-time calculations
dc1394: port to 1.X
Enable qmlglsink on Rasperry PI
androidmedia: assorted refactoring
bad plugins: use new gst_element_class_add_static_pad_template()
ahcsrc: replace with new surfacetexture
ahcsrc: remove unused variable
player: Add is_live flag to the GstPlayerMediaInfo
ahcsrc: add finalize function
rfbsrc: leads to - > invalid video buffer received
mpegtsmux doesn't keep language code from the incoming audio stream
ahc: use g_slice_new instead of g_slice_new0
glcontext: try wglCreateContextAttribsARB first even not using GL3 core profile
interlace: Allow interlaced sink caps, do passthrough
rtmpsrc: Add timeout property
gdpdepay: query for buffer allocator
codecparser: vp9: Wrong default values in non-intraonly/non-keyframe header fields
aggregator: remove duplicated test of flow_return in pad_chain_internal
adaptivedemux: Forward upstream buffer offsets
gldeinterlace: enable this plugin on OpenGL ES using a simple deinterlace fragment shader
dvbsrc: support dvbv5 channels format
dvbsrc: needlessly perform delivery system autodetection twice
d3dvideosink includes deprecated and unused d3dx9tex.h header
gl:cocoa:Fix incompatible type warning
player: Add A/V offset property
dshowsrcwrapper: Fix include path in CMakeLists.txt
dshowsrcwrapper: Fix link error (SAFESEH)
dshowsrcwrapper: add support for RGB32, RGB555, RGB565 and RGB8 formats
dshowsrcwrapper: Work around bugs in IDS Imaging camera drivers
aggregator: Check all pads for data when live
pvrbufferpool: gst_meta_register() parameter wrong
adaptivedemux: Segfault since " use realtime_clock for waiting for a condition " commit
glimagesink: support video frame rotation
GstPlayer build error due to not finding GstVideo-1.0.gir
videodiff element has useless " FIXME " description
uridownloader: should take ownership of its source element
player: Provide signalling for when a new URI is started
Some header files missing in sys/applemedia/ in gst-plugins-bad-1.8.1.tar.xz
mpegtsbase: remove unused variables 'upstream_live' and 'queried_latency'
kmssink: doesn't chain up finalize
player: problems with unit tests
examples: opencv: typo fix
adaptivedemux: Set DISCONT on startup and after seeks
gltestsrc,glmosaic: fix shader leaks
adaptivedemux: fix tag list leak
bad: fix leaks in tests
ahc: fix typo
glvideomixer: Using an invalid, already destroyed context
eglimage: Fails to compile because of compiler warning caused by unused function
h264parse: add support for config-interval=-1 to re-send SPS/PPS on I/IDR frames
[gl] gltransformation's pivot-z property not writable
gl: win32: no debug category set in gstglcontext_wgl.c
h265parse: codec_data cap field could be mis-populated when vps/sps/pps id's are not used contiguously from zero.
Various warningfixes for OSX (10.9.5) compiling with Apple LLVM version 6.0
Android decodebin: zero copy between hardware decoder and glimagesink doesn't work (regression in 1.9)
applemedia: vtenc: Register a hardware-only vtenc_h264_hw element on OSX
templatematch: fix leak in test
a2dpsink: unref avdtpsink if state transition failed
bad: use MAY_BE_LEAKED flag
adaptivedemux: Add custom flow return for allowing subclasses to specify when a fragment is finished
OpenJPEG decoder: use new sampling field to determine channel order for j2c and jpc streams
curlsmtpsink: Lock and don't send final boundary upon error
jpeg2000parse: support j2c and jp2 file formats
qmlglsink: Add Wayland support
Introduce a WebRTC Audio Processing based echo canceller for GStreamer
jpeg2000parse: use enums for colorspace and sampling, rather than strings
gl: Raw uploader is broken
shmsrc: gst_poll_remove_fd: assertion 'fd- > fd > = 0' failed
srtpenc: remove get-rollover-counter signal and add stats property
